overview: Explore the life and career of Nikolay Rimsky-Korsakov, one of Russia's most celebrated nationalist composers, in this engaging documentary. From his early musical apprenticeship to his inclusion in the group of Russian nationalist composers known as "The Five" and his renowned works "Le Coq d'Or" and "The Russian Eastern Festival Overture," every aspect of this beloved musician's work is examined.
title: Great Russian Composers: Nikolay Rimsky-Korsakov
